TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerRegion extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject

summary.span: 在設計階段標記內為關聯的控制項定義內容區域。

span.span: Defines a region of content within the design-time markup for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都代表所產生的設計階段標記內的內容區域實作。The object represents a region of content within the design-time markup that is generated by a implementation. 控制項開發人員會使用在自訂設計工具區域實作來定義不同的區域相關聯的控制項設計階段標記內，並提供編輯和事件處理的區域。A control developer uses designer regions in a custom implementation to define separate areas within the design-time markup for the associated control and to provide editing and event handling for the area. 視覺效果設計工具，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，可以使用設計工具區域，顯示在設計介面上控制項的不同的區域，並引發使用者事件的控制項設計工具區域。A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], can use designer regions to display the separate areas of a control on the design surface and to raise user events for the region to the control designer. 因為許多區域為基礎的功能由基底設計工具類別或提供視覺化設計工具，設計工具區域可簡化控制項設計工具的實作。Designer regions can simplify a control designer implementation because many region-based features are provided by the base designer classes and the visual designer. 類別提供的基本功能，設計工具區域，例如能夠按一下，選取，並反白顯示設計介面中的區域。The class provides the base functionality for designer regions, such as the ability to click, select, and highlight a region in the design surface. 使用控制項設計工具的實作，來定義不需要編輯的區域中的物件。Use a object in a control designer implementation to define a region that does not require editing. 使用衍生控制項設計工具的實作，在設計階段定義可編輯的內容包含的區域中的類別。Use the derived class in a control designer implementation to define a region with editable content at design time. 使用衍生控制項設計工具的實作，來定義可編輯區域，表示控制項中的範本中的類別。Use the derived class in a control designer implementation to define an editable region that represents a template in a control. 若要支援從衍生類別內的區域，覆寫方法，並新增一或多個初始化物件新增至集合。To support regions within a class that is derived from the , override the method and add one or more initialized objects to the collection. （選擇性） 您可以處理在區域 設計介面上按一下滑鼠，藉由覆寫方法。Optionally, you can handle mouse clicks in the regions on the design surface by overriding the method. 使用的屬性物件，以判斷該區域，視覺化設計工具的顯示方式。Use the properties of a object to determine how the region is displayed by the visual designer. 覆寫屬性，表示設計介面上的使用者可以選取區域。Override the property to indicate that the region can be selected by the user on the design surface. 使用屬性來反白顯示設計工具區域，在視覺化設計工具中; 例如，您可以反白顯示區域之後使用者已按一下來選取它。Use the property to highlight the designer region in the visual designer; for example, you can highlight a region after a user has clicked to select it. 使用和儲存或擷取區域相關的其他詳細資料的屬性。Use the and properties to store or retrieve additional details about the region. 特別是，屬性可由視覺化設計工具使用者將滑鼠指標移至設計工具區域上方時顯示工具提示資訊。In particular, the property is used by the visual designer to display ToolTip information when the user moves the mouse pointer over the designer region. 使用屬性來存取的方法和屬性的控制項設計工具物件，包含設計工具區域。Use the property to access the methods and properties of the control designer object that contains the designer region.

summary.span: 定義設計工具區域的 HTML 屬性名稱。

span.span: Defines the HTML attribute name for a designer region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具區域的屬性名稱是`_designerRegion`。The attribute name for a designer region is `_designerRegion`. 欄位用來識別控制項設計工具的設計階段 HTML 標記內的區域。The field is used to identify regions within the design-time HTML markup for the control designer.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控制項設計工具的實作，使用儲存或擷取設計工具區域的其他資訊的屬性。Within a control designer implementation, use the property to store or retrieve additional information for the designer region. 例如，如果控制項設計工具的實作會支援從多個設計工具區域選取，您可以使用控制項設計工具，來儲存每個區域的唯一索引中的屬性。For example, if the control designer implementation supports selecting from multiple designer regions, you can use the property in a control designer to store a unique index for each region. 然後您可以使用屬性會傳入的地區方法，可儲存目前選取的區域的索引。You can then use the property for the region that is passed into the method to store the index for the currently selected region.
